--- On Thu, 23 Feb 2006, stack wrote:
> ...
> A while back I petitioned for suggestions on what to add to JMX API 
> (Here is the posting: 
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/1842). The 
> petition may have been premature.  Since its basically working -- you 
> can't add/remove/reorder filters/processors or add overrides but you can 
> effect most other attributes of a running crawl, etc. -- thought is that 
> requests for enhancements to JMX API should now just get filed as you 
> would any other request, as an RFE against Heritrix.  A few minor ones 
> are all that currently exist. 
> 
> You thinking something substantial John?

Dunno yet, but if there is the RFE route should be very helpful.
Thanks also for the background pointers!

-John


> The ultimate goal is that all control goes via the one interface whether 
> the local web UI or a remote cluster controller passing the config.to 
> all members of a Heritrix crawling cluster.
